Name: Protecting Santa
About the game: Every Christmas, someone is sure to stop Santa Claus from doing his job, and so it happened this time. The robbers want to get rich on Santa's gifts, and launch a huge snow boulder. The only helper is the snowman. Breathing life into him, Santa hopes only for him. Don't let me down. Protecting Santa - Top Down is a game where you have to run and protect Santa from a snowball, put your hand and beat him back to defeat the robbers, but be careful they can hurt Santa too. All in your hands Game Features: - Beautiful graphics - Pleasant musical accompaniment - Difficulty
